title: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again

metadata.narration_text: Here’s what happened: A wave paralysed me but AI could help me walk again — Dan Richards, 37, from Swansea was injured in a freak accident on New Year's Eve in 2023.

title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids

metadata.narration_text: Here’s what happened: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids — The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.

title: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026

metadata.narration_text: Here’s what happened: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026 — Dexter Original Sin actor Patrick Gibson will star as the British spy when the game releases on 27 May.

title: Many new UK drone users must take theory test before flying outside

metadata.narration_text: Here’s what happened: Many new UK drone users must take theory test before flying outside — The Civil Aviation Authority reckons up to half a million people in the UK may be impacted by its new requirements.

title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas

metadata.narration_text: Here’s what happened: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas — The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.
